channel.title: When i run my server it says its already in use

item.title: When i run my server it says its already in use

@James-RevolutionX wrote:

127.0.0.1 if your not already hosting, also in your client search for Gui and/or server and change it from there as well as in the source.

item.source: When i run my server it says its already in use

item.title: When i run my server it says its already in use
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

I’m not 100% sure but, are you already hosting a server?
Are you running another server at the same time, if none of these are correct then follow these steps:

Go into Source —> Gui —> ctrl + f --> search the ip that that server is useing say if it’s repood.no-ip.biz —> change that to your ip or local host (127.0.0.1)

Good luck.

Read full topic
